entry.title: 🚨 $FRAME airdrop alert 🚨 If you’ve traded NFTs on Ethereum in the past 2 years you’ll be eligible for a $FRAME airdrop. Frame is an L2 develop...
entry.summary:
🚨 $FRAME airdrop alert 🚨 If you’ve traded NFTs on Ethereum in the past 2 years you’ll be eligible for a $FRAME airdrop. Frame is an L2 developed by some top-notch devs focusing on NFTs and gaming applications. The tokens are non-transferable for now.
Frame: It's time to enter the next chapter of NFTs, together. Today, we're announcing: 1. Our initial fundraise led by @electriccapital and community members. 2. The initial airdrop of $FRAME, available to anyone whose traded an NFT on ETH the last two years. Happy Holidays! 🎄🖼️

entry.title: Rainbow - one of the most user-friendly crypto wallets out there has launched points. If you have an active on-chain transaction history and import yo...
entry.summary:
Rainbow - one of the most user-friendly crypto wallets out there has launched points. If you have an active on-chain transaction history and import your address you'll have some points waiting for you already 🪂 And there's many ways to earn more 🧵 https://rainbow.me/points?ref=PT7FGY
Rainbow: Welcome to Rainbow Points — the first step towards including our community in the future success of Rainbow Every Ethereum user has been dropped points today 🌈 Claim your points and start earning more by doing the things you already do onchain
